resources.string: Levi is a serious person, with a firm character and clear ideas. He has great respect for discipline and is a recruit with enormous potential to be a leader, as his orders are always clear and precise, without anyone daring to question his authority.
Erwin was a capable, intelligent and respected man, who, like Levi, took great care of his men and did not hesitate to sacrifice himself for the future of humanity.

Armin is a childhood friend of Eren Jaeger and Mikasa Ackerman. Although physically weaker than the rest of his teammates, he demonstrates great intelligence through his strategic ability and quick solutions.
Mikasa is the adoptive sister of Eren Jaeger. She owes a lot to him, since he saved her from kidnappers who intended to make her a slave, and they spend most of their time together.
Eren is a teenager who swears revenge on huge creatures known as titans who devoured his mother and destroyed his city at Wall Maria.
